title: Rust Variable Bindings and Type Inference
description: In this lab, we learn about variable bindings in Rust, where values can be assigned to variables using the let binding, and how type annotations can be used but are often inferred by the compiler.

meta.title: Rust Variable Bindings | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn about variable bindings in Rust, where values can be assigned to variables using the `let` binding, and how type annotations can be used but are often inferred by the compiler.
meta.keywords: Rust, Variable Bindings, Programming Tutorials, Static Typing, Type Inference

i18n.title: Rust 变量绑定与类型推断
